password.title: VU Password

username.title: VU Username

serverGUID.description: Server's Public ID with or without dashes. Can be found in join string
serverGUID.title: Server Guid

serverPassword.placeholder: password - Leave blank if no password
serverPassword.title: Server Password (optional)

sheet.description: Lets you join a server after selecting a soldier, skipping the server browser.
sheet.title: Add a quick-join server

client.cefdebug: Enable verbose debugging logging for CEF for WebUI mods. A debug.log file will be created in the directory of VU (usually %LocalAppData%\VeniceUnleashed\client).
client.credentials: -username <username> -password <password> Logs you in to your VU account using the specified VU credentials.
client.disableUiHwAcceleration: Disable hardware acceleration for WebUI. Use only if launching VU gives a black loading screen. Enabled by default on unsupported operating systems.
client.serverJoinString: Connect to a server with the given GUID and an optional password. Can be used as hyperlink to join. If join AND spectate strings are empty, VU Launcher will automatically create a join string in backend. vu://join/4ffa57c1068540e59b9a25eb6b00dfcd/amazingpass
client.serverSpectateString: Connect as a spectator to a server with the given GUID and an optional password. Can be used as hyperlink to join as a spectator. If join AND spectate strings are empty, VU Launcher will automatically create a join string in backend. vu://spectate/4ffa57c1068540e59b9a25eb6b00dfcd/amazingpass

common.activateWithEaToken: -activate -ea_token <token> Activates BF3 on the current machine using the provided EA auth token. The token can be retrieved from another computer using the command above. Keep in mind that tokens expire.
common.activateWithLSX: -activate -lsx Activates BF3 on the current machine using EA app / Origin (LSX), which must be running and be logged in to an account that owns BF3. It also prints the authentication token retrieved from the EA app.
common.activateWithOrigin: -activate -o_mail <email> -o_pass <pass> Activates BF3 on the current machine using the specified Origin credentials.
common.cacert: Set a custom CA certificate bundle to use for SSL verification.
common.console: Enable external console window for debug logging.
common.debuglog: Enable logging. Server logs are in server instance directory. Clients logs are in the VU AppData installation folder.
common.env: Set Zeus environment. Defaults to prod.
common.tracedc: Enable DataContainer Trace usage in VEXT and print any dangling DCs during level destuction.
common.updateBranch: Set update branch. Defaults to whatever -env is set to.
common.vextdebug: Set VEXT remote debugging host:port (this does not currently work). It also prevents the server / client connections from timing out and makes it so compiled VEXT modules sent to the client contain debug symbols.
common.vexttrace: Enable VEXT execution tracing. When tracing is enabled and VU crashes, the last executed line of each loaded VEXT mod will be available from the crash dialog and in the submitted crash details. Keep in mind that this could adversely affect performance.

server.disableTerrainInterpolation: Disable interpolation between different terrain LODs.
server.headless: Run VU server in headless mode (without creating any windows).
server.highResTerrain: Enable high resolution terrain. Useful for extending maps beyond their original play area.
server.joinaddr: Set IPv4 address clients should connect to. If empty backend will attempt to automatically detect the server's IP address.
server.joinhost: Set a hostname clients should use when connecting. When this is specified -joinaddr has no effect and any clients attempting to connect will not attempt to perform any NAT detection.
server.listen: Set the host and port the VU server should listen for connections on. Defaults to 0.0.0.0:25200
server.mHarmonyPort: Set the port the VU server should listen for MonitoredHarmony connections. Defaults to 7948
server.maxPlayers: Set maximum players (vars.maxPlayers + vars.maxSpectators). When using the default spectator size of 24, you won't be able to set vars.maxPlayers higher then 40.
server.remoteAdminPort: Set the host and port the VU server should listen for RCON connections. Defaults to 0.0.0.0:47200
server.serverInstancePath: Set server instance path (where the server configuration, logs, and mods are stored) for the VU server.
server.skipChecksum: Disable level checksum validation on client connection.
server.unlisted: Hide server from server list. Join requires connect console command or vu join string.

serverGuidForm.description: This will be used to Quick-Join your local server.
serverGuidForm.title: Local Server GUID

RM.battleCryLink: link to your battlecry JSON endpoint
RM.setAdmins: Set list of admins, separated by a space
RM.setDevelopers: Set list of developers, separated by a space
RM.setLightAdmins: Set list of light-admins, separated by a space
RM.tempReservedSlotsRejoinTime: how long before rejoin is removed

reservedSlots.add: list of players to add to reserved slot separated by comma ,

vars.gameModeCounter: Set scale factor for number of tickets to end round
vars.idleBanRounds: Set how many rounds idle timeout should ban (if at all)
vars.playerManDownTime: Set player man-down time scale factor
vars.playerRespawnTime: Set player respawn time scale factor
vars.roundRestartPlayerCount: Set min players numbers to revert to warm-up
vars.roundStartPlayerCount: Set min players to activate pre-round/in-round
vars.soldierHealth: Set soldier max health scale factor
vars.teamKillCountForKick: Set number of teamkills allowed during a round
vars.teamKillKickForBan: Set number of team-kill kicks that will lead to permaban
vars.teamKillValueForKick: Set max kill-value allowed for a player before he/she is kicked
vars.teamKillValuelncrease: Set kill-value increase for a teamkill
vars.vehicleSpawnDelay: Set vehicle spawn delay scale factor

vu.CorpseDamageEnabled: Enables corpse damage to prevent revives
vu.HighPerformanceReplication: Enable high-performance updates on far away players
vu.HttpAssetUrl: Set URL pointing to remote [ui.vuic] instead of downloading from game server
vu.ServerBanner: Set browser banner URL pointing to 1378x162 jpg
vu.SetTeamTicketCount: Set team ticket count for a team.
vu.TeamActivatedMines: Enable mines to trigger on allies
vu.TimeScale: Slow down or speed up game [0.0, 2.0]
